idea-plugin.name: FreeMarker Syntax Highlighter
idea-plugin.description:
A simple plugin to highlight FreeMarker syntax in .ftl files

Key Features:

  • Syntax highlighting for FreeMarker templates
  • Automatic recognition of .ftl files as FreeMarker files
  • Customizable color schemes for different syntactic elements
  • Support for FreeMarker directives, macros, and expressions

How to Use:

  • Install the plugin and restart the IDE
  • Open any existing .ftl file or create a new one
  • FreeMarker syntax will be automatically highlighted
  • Customize colors via Settings > Editor > Color Scheme > FreeMarker

Perfect for developers working with FreeMarker templates in Java, Spring, or other framework projects.
